preqs: Students must have passed MKW2420 or MKG2420 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MKC3130, MKF3131, MKW3440}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MKB2420, MKG2420, MKW2420} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: Corporate strategy and marketing strategy, strategic perspectives on buyer behaviour, strategic use of marketing mix variables such as communication, pricing, distribution, product, external and internal decision environments, market position and analysis, corporate and marketing strategic direction, managing marketing strategy -- planning and control.
